thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Paula

author: Paula
title: Paula
text: I LOVE this website! I read a lot so I like to buy books at a discounted price. Thrift books has been a life saver! I love that I get free shipping on all my orders (I never order less than 3 books so I always hit the $10/free shipping). My favorite thing is the reading rewards. What other book store or site will give you coupons for 1/10th of what you spend on books? I've earned and used 3 reading rewards coupons over the last 3 weeks!
